why_are_you_rejecting_this_application_d:
On the application, the candidate explains that he would not be able to commence the course without the costs of training covered by a grant or bursary; Primary PCGE trainees are currently not eligible for either. They are only awarded for specific secondary subjects. (Chemistry, computing, maths, physics, classics, languages, biology.) https://beta-getintoteaching.education.gov.uk/guidance/financial-support-for-teacher-training 

Salaried places are also very rare; we have not been able to obtain any over the last few years, and are offered at schools' discretion.
